parameters.toolDescription: Invites a customer to onboard and complete their tenant setup. Use this when users ask 'invite a customer', 'send customer invitation', 'onboard customer', etc. Parameters: customerId (string, required) - ID of the customer to invite, userName (string, required) - name for the user account, userEmail (string, required) - email for the user account. If user provides customer name instead of ID, use getAllCustomers to find the ID first.
